title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.3 - Method of appointment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 335.3 - Method of appointment

State Regulations

The chancellor, after considering the recommendation of
the chief administrative officer of the college concerned, and except as
hereinafter permitted with respect to appointment of distinguished, distinguished service, distinguished teaching and university professors, may
grant continuing appointment to such persons who, in the chancellor's judgment, are best qualified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
335.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
